text: Sergey Gerasimovich Mitin (; born June 14, 1951 Gorky, Soviet Union) is a Russian politician. Mitin served as Governor of Novgorod Oblast, Russia from August 7, 2007 to February 13, 2017. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Novgorod Oblast Category:Heads of the federal subjects of Russia Category:People from Nizhny Novgorod Category:United Russia politicians Category:21st-century Russian politicians
title: Sergey Gerasimovich Mitin
